TopicTitle: Wiki giving hints to the hints?

Articles.Content:
I was reading the update changelog on the wiki for 0.20, I found this:

New Loading Screens, with hints

Post what you think about it and what these so-called hints mean
I haven't seen any hints in there yet. Right now I'm pretty sure the splash texts are just for sillyness, not actual game advice.

Right now I'm pretty sure the splash texts are just for sillyness

Which is the point.

Edited June 2, 2013 by Mephane

"Adding more boosters."

Clearly an educational hint.

Exactly. Sounds like something straight outta rocketry school to me. The "Jebediah institute for the Areonautically challenged" recently began teaching their students the importance of such things.
I've noticed that when loading, it always having to locate Jeb. What is he doing when I don't have the game loaded, and how many Kerbal's lost their lives during it?
It's too busy answering the Ultimate Question to give hints to players...
the hints are probably something along the lines of "fuel lines do not work on solid rocket boosters"
